title: Carrot and lemon cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cake', '280g (10oz) caster sugar', '225g (8oz) butter (this is for cake mix)', '280g (10oz) self-raising flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg or grated nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '2 eggs', '57g (2oz) raisins', '1 carrot, finely grated', '2 drops lemon flavouring', '80ml milk', 'For the icing', '170g (6oz) icing sugar', '85g (3oz) butter', '1 tablespoon milk, or more as needed', '1 drop lemon flavouring', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch ground ginger']
